In this cruel dog-eat-dog world, the high school student Ye Hao could only rise to level three. When he was about to die, he accidentally triggered the king's account upgrade system, can Ye Hao become the strongest king?

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

title.english: My Three Thousand Years To The Sky

description:
At the age of seventeen, Bai already reached level ten of the Qi Refining stage, just about to breakthrough. What a genius!

Three thousand years later, Bai has already reached level 66,66a of Qi Refining… yet… there’s still no sign of breaking through at all. From Grandmaster to “Grand-Monster”, he can still be a bad*ss even when stuck on the newbie stage for three thousand years!

(Source: Mangatoon)

Note: Includes a bonus CNY chapter and a seven-chapter side story.

title.english: Counterattack of the Superrich House Husband

description:
Han Sanqian has been married into the Su clan for three years, but he was called a trash son-in-law and treated like a doormat by the other relatives. In order to protect his wife Su Yingxia from further humiliation, Han Sanqian worked secretly to become a super son-in-law in preparation for some payback.

(Source: Manman, translated)

Being kicked out by the sect? Being humiliated by fellows? And being alienated by my lover? None of those could stop me, even if my inner power pool is broken. Wait when I reach the top and become the king of martial arts!

(Source: MangaToon)

To defeat his uncle who destroyed his family, the teenager Xuan Tian embarked on a martial arts training journey to hone his sword techniques. From a teenager who knew nothing to a Sword God of his generation, those he once saw as strong are now mere specks of dust to him. With one finger, I obliterate all; With my sword, I defy the heavens! And his path, leads him directly to the limitless heavens!

While Ice Age is approaching, after being killed by the girl i had a crush on, I was reborn and gained a magical ability. Snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? Surprisingly, this ability can still be used in other ways too?!... With crises looming, I'll live for myself in this life!

(Source: Webnovel)

Zhang Nan, the young master of the Hidden Dragon Family, wanted to become an ordinary person, but he was sent to the aristocratic training school by his grandfather. When he was assigned to an all-female class by a confused teacher, Zhang Nan finds himself tortured by these heirs to the brink of dropping out..

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Cong Renzhen Wan Youxi Kaishi Jueqi
title.english: It All Starts with Playing Game Seriously
title.native: 从认真玩游戏开始崛起

description:
When the world of the online game Yuanjie became reality, people obtained their in-game abilities in real life, and the world descended into chaos. Liu Yi, patient and strong but afraid of fighting, was reborn to the time before the game became reality, and will now have to play the game seriously and overcome his fear of fighting, in order to become the savior to overcome this doomsday crisis.

(Source: QQ, translated)

"So many demon spirits, I want to collect them." Long Ao Tian. Yuan Ding, goes on a journey of collecting demon spirits
.

When Jiang Wanshu met Ren Pingsheng, what she thought was her light, became the beginning of her nightmare. As a teacher, Ren Pingsheng seems gentle and considerate on the outside, but is secretly an extremely passionate reader of Jiang Wanshu's book. What seemed to be a "coincidental" first encounter was in truth calculated and planned.

Behind the peaceful days, the crazy reader has begun her hunt...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Includes four extra chapters.

Zhang Gong decides to learn light magic, a magic few show interest in and eventually becomes the legendary Grand Mage. While trying to end the continent's east and west separation in order to unite all of the different races, he becomes every race's Child of Light.

title.english: The Daily Life of Immortal King

description:
It is an era where everyone is a cultivator except for Wang Ling. He doesn't care about cultivation, elixirs, and whatnot, yet he shows an aptitude for martial arts. He picks up sword skills at three and attains Godhood at five. Despite his efforts to keep a low profile, he quickly makes a name for himself.

(Source: WebComics)

Jiang Bai was killed in a truck accident when trying to escape from a high risk casino after winning a huge amount of money but instead of dying, his soul was transported into a parallel world that is similar to Earth and merge with his alternate pathetic self. Over there he met the mad god who grant him a powerful BUG ability in this new world. Jiang Bai is now stuck in his alternate world self, who is far weaker and less more influential than the original him. Can he make a comeback in this new parallel earth with his new cheat abilities?

The story happens on the Dragonrealm continent. Heron, the protagonist of the story, was born in a remote village. After seeing hunting skills beyond his power, he decides to go on an adventure for further advancement, and soon his journey is accompanied by cruel enemies as well as faithful friends. At the same point, the continent is undergoing a monstrous conspiracy. As the mysterious robot and the dark forces appear, an epic war is about to start.

(Source: Webnovel)

He always thought he was just an ordinary guy, but he didn’t know that his yard was full of divine artifacts and the chickens he raised were actually phoenixes! It wasn’t until after five years of living in an ordinary village when the System finally allowed him to come into contact with cultivators. It was then that he discovered that no matter how strong someone was, the moment they saw him, they would be so intimidated that they would tremble in fear. Some would even kneel down and call him master…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Being looked down on, divorced, and killed—maybe that’s the life of a loser after all... However, I was reborn by Cang Kunzi, the best cultivator in the world of immortal cultivation. If that’s the case, I may as well make the best out of this situation. Watch how I use this body of a loser to crush all of you powerless bunch!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Emperor of the cultivation world Mo Weiyu deceived elders and slaughtered ancestors, and committed all crimes and sins known to man. After ending his own life, he was reborn and transmigrated to the year he first became a disciple.

In the shell of a boy held an old and weary soul. After coming back to life, truth after truth that had been hidden below the surface in the previous life floated to the top and broke through the waters one after the other.

Of all revelations, the one that stunned him the most was that the Shizun he had hated to the bone in his previous life had always been protecting him from the shadows...

The heart of a man can change; even demons and monsters can become compassionate and do good. Only, he had sinned deeply. Can the blood on his hands ever be cleansed?

An ordinary student accidentally traveled into an other universe and became the king of a small kingdom. He had gotten a “Cheating Code” of life and was able to complete something extraordinary. This is the story about a king that was able to conquer continents and leave behind him an ultimate legend that will be recited between every generation to come.

Every world is like a flower, The secular realm as we know it is but a speck of dust in the hands of deities and demons. One moment for them, a thousand years in the mortal world. Even mountain ranges and vast oceans are but mere illusions.

The Tianyuan God Sect was once the mightiest sect in the great Dashang. Ye Xingyun’s master and also the sect leader of the Tianyuan God Sect, Diejiu ascends to become a deity and leaves the sect in the hands of Yi Xingyun who’s cultivation has stagnated due to missing one of the eight veins.

title.romaji: Qiandao 30 Tian Yi Quan Bao Xing

description:
Invasion of gods from other world, Ten thousand saviors were selected to enter the secret realm, where the bloodthirsty battles against demonic beasts are streamed live for the whole world to see.

Chu Mo: Are you crazy? Except me, all the saviors are immortals. How am I supposed to fight a demonic beast, Is this reasonable?

"The sign-in system is activated. "
On the first day of sign-in, You will get the power of the thousand-year-old demonic beast.
On the second day of sign-in, You will gain the battle experience of the legendary God of War.
After 30 days of signing in, I can explode the stars with one punch!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Our protagonist embarks on a journey from a humble mountain village, accompanied by two companions: a strategist and a groom. His goal is to transform the village into the strongest mountain stronghold. He arrives in a chaotic world where he inherits a dilapidated mountain fortress. In the face of this tumultuous and deadly environment, he faces a critical choice: Will he resort to robbing money, food, and women to become a carefree king of the mountain? Or will he pour his heart and soul into battling the heroes of the world, striving to earn a name that will echo throughout the universe? Is anyone truly born destined to be a king, duke, general, or minister?

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Wo Bei Kun Zai Tong Yi Tian Shiwan Nian
title.native: 我被困在同一天十万年

description:
When Lin Yue was transported to the Hong Meng Continent, he was forced to live the same day for 100,000 years. No matter how much he struggled, he would still return to the same day at sunrise. In a hundred millennia, Lin Yue learned everything there was to know about the world, unlocking the secrets of countless mighty warriors from numerous sects.Gradually, he had to accept the fact that he would never escape his endless loop of reincarnation.However, on the final day of the 100,000th year, Lin Yue snatched away the Seven Demons Emperor’s fiancée and chopped off the arm of a sect elder’s son. After stirring up such a catastrophe, he suddenly found that a brand-new day had opened its doors for him…

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

This is an examination that puts your life at stake. Answer a plethora of questions, pass the exam, and you may live. Two-faced examiner, Qin Jiu, meets the cold examinee, You Huo. In this inhumane system, both of them who have lost their memories go head to head against each other. Despite that, they have a strong mutual understanding. Alarms go off and the system collapses time and time again. During which, their memories gradually return. It turns out that even at the end of the world where there's only dust left, you're still the first person I met. What's so great about this system? We'll just destroy it. The world is brilliant and grand still, so welcome home.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

High schooler Li Huowang can close his eyes and be transported to an uncanny world. Over there, he is a medicine primer who will be made into pills by his "Master" at any given time. Meanwhile, in the real world, Li Huowang is living in a mental hospital, unfit to continue school. The doctor told him that the uncanny world is just his hallucinations. What is real, and what is fake? Li Huowang really does not know.

(Source: Webnovel)

Zhang Ping is tired of being seen as powerless, so he takes matters into his own hands by contracting himself with a forbidden gem. Now, with evolving powers and new challenges around every corner, he’s stepping into a world full of dangerous beasts and unpredictable enemies. His journey to survive and grow stronger has just begun.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Zui Qiang Mo Jun De Wo Turan Bian Xiao Le
title.english: I, the Strongest Demon, Have Regained My Youth?!
title.native: 最强魔君的我，突然变小了?!

description:
In order to maintain his rule, Xin Sheng, the eternal demon king who ruled the world, went deep into the demon realm to find the highest and strongest power. Thousands of years later, he has become stronger and younger, and the world has also changed...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.english: The Villainess and Miss Demon Lord

description:
Transmigrated as the doomed villainess Aida Mortemer, Yao faces a peculiar challenge in a magical world. Enrolled in a magic academy without magical abilities, her plans to charm the main characters are slightly derailed when she encounters the demon lord's reincarnation. Desperate to survive and avoid her painful demise, Aida also befriends the formidable Miss Demon Lord, only to find her behavior increasingly...odd? Can Aida navigate this magical minefield and get these characters on her side?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes 8 extra chapters.

From an early age, Xu Shenze would often get caught up in the same strange dream. Over time, the dark shadow that the dream cast over his life grew, until, one day, the shadow became real, and suddenly Xu Shenze's life as he knew it was completely torn to shreds. His parents suddenly meet a gruesome end, and all sorts of other strange and disturbing events kept on happening to him. Alone and afraid, when he hears about a supposed "dream town", he decides to go there to look for answers. In the town that is called both the "Holy Land" and "Purgatory" by its residents, what sort of terrible truths are waiting for Xu Shenze?

title.romaji: Zhi You Wo Neng Yong Zhao Huan Shu

description:
Zayn Ze travels to a parallel universe where people grow stronger by fighting monsters in the Demon Realm to prevent them from invading the Summer Nation, the real world where he currently resides. To protect his sister Nina, Zayn enters the Demon Realm under the alias "Loki." However, he unexpectedly awakens with the rare and overpowered SSS-level Summoning Skill! This ability allows him to summon and control every monster he defeats. As his Summoning Skill grows stronger, it becomes a trump card that can tip the balance in this dangerous world!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wangyou: Shen Ji Cike, Wo Ji Shi Anying
title.native: 网游：神级刺客，我即是暗影

description:
In a world where people sleep and enter a realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who sacrificed everything for his sister, faces betrayal from her. However, fate offers him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world emerges. This time, Qin Feng decides to abandon his sister and concentrate on becoming the strongest.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

In an apocalyptic world where cutting-edge technology is a relic of the past, despite his illness, Xiaosu hunts to get through each day and support his brother Liuyuan, who has a special ability related to luck. However, one day, Xiaosu unlocks a palace that offers quests in return for strength and skills. As he starts to grow while completing the quests, he starts to wonder what the palace actually is and whether he'll be able to bring down the barrier that divides the powerful from the powerless one day with his newfound power.

(Source: Tappytoon)

I was once the Supreme God of Physique, standing tall above others. However, I was betrayed by those whom I thought of as my most trustworthy friends. They had schemed against me in an attempt to kill me, which was almost successful. Fortunately, a fraction of my soul had managed to escape into the body of a seriously injured child giving me another chance at life, and revenge.

title.english: SSS-Rank Paladin Who Transcends Common Sense

description:
When the game world descended into reality, magical monsters ran rampant spreading calamities. People were forced to choose a class and fight to level-up to grow strong and survive. The ordinary and inconspicuous Zhou Yi was blessed by S+ holy angels on the day of the transformation and unlocked the hidden profession of Paladin! Holy weapons, angelic blessings, honor bonuses… Watch all the buffs stack up as Zhou Yi becomes an invincible force of nature. Who says paladin is a weak class?

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Wo You Jiuqianwan-yi Tian Gou Jin

description:
Chen Yuan, a college boy, worshiped Lin Shutong like a goddess for three years, but he was treated like a loser and kicked to the curb. In despair, he accidentally activated the Simping Fund system. It gave him an account with nine quadrillion dollars. This money can only be used to simp for women. The more you spend, the more rewards you will get back, and you can also earn various attribute bonuses to eventually become a super-boy.

It’s called the Simping Fund System, but do I want to be a simp? If I spend enough, I'll be the king here. With enough money to prove my love, I can make those goddesses simp for me! With this new realization, Chen Yuan will embark on a remarkable new life!

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Kun Zai Zhe Yi Tian Yi Sanqian Nian
title.english: I Have Been Trapped In This Day for Three Thousand Years
title.native: 我困在这一天已三千年

description:
Lu Feng has spent the last 3000 years reliving the exact same day over and over again. His only solace throughout the millennia has been rescuing his teammates each and every time he's forced to repeat the clearing of the shadow world. But when Lu obtains a mysterious item after what seemed like another routine completion, he finds himself waking up in his room and beginning a brand new day!

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Bai Yueguang Nü Zhu Zong Xiang Duzhan Wo
title.english: Omega Heroine Wants Her Alpha Villainess
title.native: 白月光女主总想独占我

description:
After a biking mishap, Willow Ji lands in an Omegaverse novel as a doomed Alpha villainess. To avoid a shark-infested fate, she navigates cautiously around Serena Wei, the Omega heroine, aiming to win her heart with kindness. Initially suspicious, Serena gradually warms up to Willow, even harboring feelings for her. As the lines between protagonist and antagonist blur, the question arises: when will Willow realize that their feelings are mutual, and her "foe" has also fallen deeply for her?

(Source: Tapas)

Everyone in the company knows those two women as fierce competitors who fight all the time. But at the company new year's party, they managed to break the ice after a few too many drinks! After that accidental encounter, the sworn enemies begin to have strange feelings about each other…

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Due to a mistake on his student’s part, a super Martial Artist received the wrong class in an online game and has become a mage. He, who was used to curbing violence with violence and using strength to subdue strength, could only make the best out of this mistake. Taking on a new lease in life, he became a violent close combat mage. When strength and magic came perfectly together, a new gaming path had been opened by him!

Just an average joe with a crush on the school goddess, Wang Xiaoxiu's life takes a polar plunge when he becomes the target of a jealous gang leader. One frigid dip in the river later, he teleports away with a mysterious cube: a gateway to the Ultimate Universe System. Thrust into a world of superpowers, Xiaoxiu embraces his newfound abilities and embarks on a quest for avenging wrongdoings. He paves his path not as your average joe, but as a rising hero forged in the icy waters of fate.

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong
title.english: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
title.native: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

description:
One day, a girl suddenly confessed to me. In order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend. I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to an even bigger mess? The Archery Club's tsundere "Mad Dog”, the flirtatious “White Fox”, the long-black-haired “Unattainable Flower”, and… my yandere bro-con sister! How did my youthful love story come to this?

(Source: Billibilli, translated)

title.romaji: Ao Jiao Nai Ba Xiuxiang Tao

description:
Having a two-faced bitch as a rival in love isn’t scary. What’s scary is that the bitch has the upper hand—reincarnating as his little brother! Due to his little brother, his lover cheated on him, his grandfather suffered a violent death, his family business was taken over, and on top of all that he was framed and thrown into prison.

Just as he thought he’d hit bottom, he somehow got laid by a man and became pregnant on the night before his release. After he got out of prison, he came back anew; he opened a restaurant, engaged in cultivation, and made a fortune while raising his child. He lived a vibrant life, but certainly didn’t forget to seek revenge…

(Source: Webnovel)

Despite being the young lord of Merak Palace, Yi Tianyun is considered a weakling and an outcast by all those around him. The only person who cares about him is the master of the palace and his aunt, Shi Xueyun. After another day of training without much progress, Tianyun receives a special dragon blood elixir from Xueyun to replenish his health. But upon consuming it, he’s thrown into the “Frenzy Leveling Up System,” which allows him to finally gain the boost in power he’s always wanted. Now armed with a trove of incredible skills and items, is there any opponent who stands a chance against him?

(Source: Tappytoon)

Reiki is a resurrection, the entire world is covered by a strong aura, and creatures of the earth are affected by this. Humans experienced an account that they had stronger powers, and other creatures besides humans also evolved rapidly under the influence of Aura. Some powerful and mysterious races have appeared in silence. The legend says that the power remained: the family in another world, coincidentally, the soul of another world royal prince entered the body of a young common human, Huang Shang, and began the story of bloody and funny hegemony...

On the Tianwu Continent, the strong commands the weak. The young master of the Feng family Feng Hao, owns a unique physique but was mistakenly thought to be a failure in cultivation. He was chastised and humiliated constantly because of that. A chance meeting transformed him completely and ultimately altered his fate. He contoured his body with rare gems and eventually achieved invincibility. He was set on the path to conquering the void and rampaging through the universe!

(Source: BiliBili Comics)

The society calls the teaching of Yuhun Sect as “Heresy," which relying on the technique to tame spiritual beasts using magic tools. For Mo Lianjian, a young disciple who lost his parents since a little, expertise on the practice is a struggle especially when his genius childhood friend, Lian Beibei always tries to pick a fight. One day, Mo obtained a fragment of a legendary sword which rumored to be owned by the last swordsman of Yuhun Sect...

(Source: manga.club)

title.romaji: Wo Zhi Xiang Anjing De Da Youxi

description:
Other players have to grind for every HP and every life in this game, while I can just one-shot people. When dimensional rifts appeared, areas around the globe became occupied by supernatural beings as spirits, buddahs, demons, angels, and faeries all descending upon the Earth. For some reason, all these mysterious extra-dimensional realms became dungeons in my mobile game. While other adventurers risk their lives, I'm just here playing my game.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

As soon as Jiang Cheng finds out he’s adopted, he’s abandoned by his adoptive family and sent to live with his deadbeat father, who has a gambling addiction. Everything about his new life, from his pathetic father to the unfamiliar environment, makes Jiang Cheng depressed. But then he meets Gu Fei, who’s like a shining bright light in this run-down city, and the two become each other’s salvation and hope.

(Source: Tappytoon)

A Manhua of the popular smartphone game Honkai 3rd launched by miHoYo

「Collapse」 ... An unknown force once known bury the civilization of mankinds in the distant past ... now descended into this peaceful world once again.

"Honkai, the mysterious power responsible for destroying human civilization countless times, has descended upon this beautiful world once again…” With the lands now flooded with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?"

Three years ago, the third Honkai descended upon Chuangai City in the far east... Under the glow of sunset, Valkyrie Kiana leapt out from the Hyperion, plummeting through the clouds like a falling meteor towards a warship. Her relentless Valkyrie determination represented a glimmer of hope. With this breathtaking scene, the story of the Captain and the Hyperion begins and the stage is set for the battle with the Honkai. Fight for all that is beautiful in this world!

In the future, countless alien beasts will invade across the universe. Humans that devour the alien flesh can absorb their genetic powers, which ushered in an era of rapid genetic evolution. Han Sen, a newcomer to the base, became known as the "butt fiend" and despised by others. But in secret, he's actually the overpowered "B God" admired by everyone! Han Sen: Sorry, only I can take on the ultimate god-gene!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Chongzu Zhuzai: Wo Wan De Jiu Shì Tianzai
title.native: 虫族主宰：我玩的就是天灾

description:
300 years ago, rifts containing monsters appeared all over the world. Class changers, who consisted of combat, support, and life-type awakened people, fought against the monsters and protected the people. Out of the four grades of class changers, divine is the rarest, appearing once in a century, which is why all eyes were on Chen Jiang, the first divine class changer in a century. However, expectations were turned into disappointment when he awakened into the most unpopular type, the life type. However, for some reason, Chen Jiang seems quite content with what happened...

(Source: Tappytoon)
Dr. Wei struggles after finding out that the girl she hooked up with was only sixteen years old, but somehow it's not as easy to avoid the girl as she had thought.

title.romaji: Wo Mei Zhou Suiji Yi Ge Xin Zhiye
title.english: I Get A Random New Occupation Every Week
title.native: 我每周随机一个新职业

description:
When Lin Yi was fired from his job, he triggered the Career Experience System by accident. The System offered Lin Yi various career opportunities and generous rewards for completing its missions. He took advantage of those rewards to achieve his ambitions of skills, riches, and power.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

A foxy temptress. A strange misty tree demon. A girl with the power of the goddess Xianjia! Being caught between these women is a feat in it of itself, but our hero Feng Xi must fight in order to protect the peace and save the world!

A story about a Maoshan Master fighting against demons! An invincible Maoshan Taoist meets a girl working part-time jobs who's in trouble

(Source: WeComics)

Su Ye never thought of her perfect childhood friend Zheng Shu in a romantic way until recently. Normally standoffish and introverted, she isn't sure what to do with these unfamiliar feelings. Even when they hang out like they always do, it doesn't feel the same anymore... For now, all Su Ye can do is try to become better at communicating with people!

(Source: Comikey)

Note: Includes 12 extra chapters.

Welcome to a new world of immortal cultivation, based on Fengshen Yanyi. There is Emperor Zhou. Other main characters like Jiang Ziya, Su Daji, and Yang Jian all have new roles. There are the three kings of Huoyun Cave and the three sages of Daomen. The beasts and villains are here, too, Chi You and Xing Tian. Into this world comes the boy Luo Lie, who will rewrite Fengshen Yanyi by not becoming a hero, but by becoming invincible!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The story begins with an eradication of Qingcheng by a group of martial art fanatic from Wudong, whose master and disciples only has one belief – to become the strongest. In order to maintain the supremacy, it takes over all the other martial arts group and kill those refuse to yield themselves to it.

Yan Heng, a young swordman in Qingcheng, was saved by ‘Wudang Hunter' Jing Lie, who also lost his fellows because of Wudong. Being the only remnant of their groups, the two allied and start their journey of revenge.

In Clear Waters High School, the cheerful and humorous Justin used to be good friends with diligent Class President Ian. However, because of an unexpected note, they became gay partners in other's eyes. In their wonderful, yet unordinary 18 years old, will their "friendship" be able to take another step further?

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Although official sites haven't uploaded any new chapters since 2017, the author continued to release chapters on their Weibo.

As a holy knight, I was captured after losing in a battle against vampires. "Huhu~ Kill you? Keep dreaming and receive my Embrace. In the future, please give me lots of guidance, my beloved daughter~" The silvery-haired loli vampire queen gently lifted my chin and smirked in amusement, her sharp fangs aiming for my neck.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: He Shao De Shanhun Nuan Qi

description:
To become He Qiaoyan's woman, you must fulfill these three conditions: to like being pampered, to like being loved, and to like being taken good care of. You have fulfilled all the requirements, and all that's left is for you to be aware that you belong to me!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Wo De Weixin Lian San Jie

description:
Lin Hai used to be an ordinary college student, until he was added into a WeChat group where immortals made deals. From then on, his life has totally changed. The Queen Mother ran out of her facial masks? Ten peaches of immortality in exchange, no bargain. Daode Tianzun wanted some cigarettes? Ten Elixir Pills, no credit. The Red Boy craved for a bottle of Wahaha, a Chinese drink? Come on, give me your Samadhi Fire! Chang’e would like to wear sexy lingerie? Oh my, it’s a tricky case. I need to take her measurement in person. Yama wanted to buy a new sports car? Wait, was I associated with the underworld now? Well, bring me the Book of Life and Death, and check my name off...

(Source: Webnovel)

Ophelia's destined to be the antagonist of the story, persecuted for her wicked ways and lack of magical powers… until she gets a second chance. Aware of her fate, she makes amends for her notorious reputation and gathers allies, including the heroine, who's also her half-sister. How will her destiny change once these former rivals become best friends and she saves the lives of her father and steadfast bodyguard? If a visit from a strange spirit is an indicator, things are no longer by the book!

(Source: Tapas)

Note: This is a new, rebooted version of a previously cancelled manhua.

title.english: The Making Of A Miraculous Doctor

description:
Ran Ling, who aspires to become the world's greatest doctor, suddenly activates the "system"! Little does he know, it's a system with a plethora of medical expertise! What kind of medical heights can Ran Ling, a mere trainee, obtain with the help of the system?

(Source: Tapas)

Howard, the lowly office employee, is stuck at the bottom of the corporate ladder until a chance encounter with the mimic dream system changes his life! Now he can access all the adventure he ever wanted: having adventures, fighting monsters and living with his gorgeous but fierce boss! The mission, as always, is to be attractive but independent, bold but sensitive.

(Source: Webnovel)

A noble vampire prince falls for a menial human blood servant... from refusal to acceptance, she begins to worry about him and solve problems for him... However, there are gaps of status, classes and hatred between them, in this confrontation between vampires and humans, will they finally break the rule and be together?

(Source: Webcomics)

Note: Includes 5 prologues, 7 extra, and 11 side story chapters

title.romaji: Chuan Yue Cheng Fanpai Yao Ruhe Huo Ming
title.english: This Villain Emperor's Gotta Charm the Male Lead to Survive!
title.native: 穿越成反派要如何活命

description:
Yuan Xiao already died once, and now he’s about to do it again. He's been transported from his life as a domineering CEO with a taste for internet novels to the realm of his favorite story. Yuan wakes up as the villainous ruler of the Northern Empire, and he knows exactly who’s going to kill him, the male lead Heqing Yan! This brave prince has already vowed deadly revenge after being conquered. Yuan knows he must change the story’s plot to survive, but damn, did the hero always look that good?

(Source: Tapas)

She is the greatest and the last cultivator of the twenty-fourth century; however, due to a certain mishap, she crossed into another world, into another body which has families oppressing her, a scumbag fiance abusing and stepping over her... Trying to take advantage of her now? Keke! Knocking on death's door! Those who follow her will prosper, and those that oppose shall die! Behold as she pays back those who attempts to climb over her several folds!

Song Yunxiang, humanity's final mecha-sorceror, was reborn back to his schoolboy days with a powerful System. Last time when he was young, he was shunned for his lack of spiritual constitution. Because he was weak, he could only watch as his friends and comrades died in the oncoming war. In this life, he returns with a System along with 60 years of combat experience and technical knowledge. This time, back on campus, he will use his newfound power to create new mecha and destroy the monsters… All his regrets, all the friends that he missed, this time he will not make the same mistakes.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

My girlfriend just dropped a bombshell on me: She has a twin sister that I never heard of... I've been kept in the dark all this time!

(Source: Wecomics)

title.romaji: Ben Xu Xiu de Shi Jian Dao

description:
In my previous life, I was forced to cultivate for a hundred years by a ruthless empress. I severed my soul just to escape from that tiger's den! In this life, I'll learn all the martial arts and soul techniques so that I can change this perilous world!

(Source: Bilibili Comics, translated)

When Wen Yifan returns to her hometown for work, she runs into the super hot guy everyone's talking about. However, this super hottie turns out to be Sang Yan, the guy whose feelings she crushed when she rejected him back in high school! In a twist of fate, two paths that remained separate all that time now seem to be intertwined as they keep bumping into each other. What's more, they coincidentally end up renting the same apartment and becoming roommates! Watch how Sang Yan, dubbed the "perfect boyfriend”, navigates his way through love amidst a whirlwind of unspoken feelings and strong emotions!

(Source: Pocket Comics)

title.romaji: Wo de Dizi Dou Chao Shen

description:
Ye Yang, the game tester of the game company, crossed with the account of “full profession and maxed skill-set”! The life of a patriarch of man level sword master + immortal cultivator + magician starts. The headache is that a group of beautiful disciples advise him to improve every day.

(Source: Koudai Yuzhou, translated)

The cute and bubbly Star Mu has been childhood friends with popular and athletic Austin Si since they were five. The pair know each other like the back of their hands, but as they hit their teen years, they’re beginning to think of holding hands…! Despite their close and sweet bond, these fresh feelings can’t help but spark issues. Star begins to pull away, and the usually perceptive Austin finds himself at a loss. With new friends on the horizon with their own goals in sight, perhaps things are no longer so clear and simple as they once were…

(Source: Tapas)

Xia Yuxun's presence at school never fails to draw attention. She has a mature beauty about her, always poised, and exuding confidence in class. Being admired so much by her classmates, one would think she's a well-respected senior but in truth, it might be because she's a repeat student. Xia Yuxun has more to her elegant facade.

(Source: Webcomics)

Centuries ago, the emergence of a monster-filled tower heralded the apocalypse. Only clearing the tower can save the world and Xiao Lin, the light of humanity, is the only one capable of such a feat. Unfortunately for him, this is not his story. After being one-shot by the monster king, the legend of Xiao Lin comes to an end and Demon Lord Ming Jiu's begins.

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Wo De Nü Tudi Men Dou Shi Weilai Zhu Tian Dalao
title.native: 我的女徒弟们都是未来诸天大佬

description:
The historical timeline is facing collapse, and the strongest Taoist master was sent back to one hundred thousand years ago with his entire body of cultivation. Ding~ Your system-assigned mission is here, it's up to you to entice all the female apprentices!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Shen Jie Jianglin: Zui Qiang Yi Shijie
title.english: The Divine Ring Descends: The Strongest Otherworld
title.native: 神戒降临: 最强异世界

description:
When darkness invades the city, zillions of human warriors come into being, but Aiden isn't one of them. One day, he comes across a mysterious ring and is sent into the Orc Realm where humans are forbidden, by a treaty. He magically survives his execution, lifts the Orc Tribe's sacred hammer, and becomes the tribe leader. Just then, he is transported back to his original reality.

(Source: WebComics)

Cool and quirky runway model Simone and her witty lawyer lover Marissa were spotted KISSING on the street! Not only that, the photo is all over the internet and people will NOT stop talking about it!! Now their families, employers, and even the public are pressuring them to call it quits on their relationship. But despite their struggle to gain acceptance, Simone and Marissa are set on showing everyone that love is like a well-mixed drink; the sweeter the taste, the harder it is to put down.

(Source: Tapas)

A sky with two moons; a soul world of endless possibilities;
Lonely darkness, and a strange and mysterious clown!
A federation of 100 cities. Three great empires. A world where monsters run rampant.
This is an age where heroes are born, where humanity strives to retake the earth!
And at the epicenter of it all: a special second-year student, Wang Zhong, who uses the power of the Playful Roulette to shake the whole world! You hear that, ladies? Your Senior is here!

(Source: WebNovels)

Brandon, an unwanted son of a wealthy family, was saved by a demi-god after being murdered. The demi-god taught him the secret of cultivating. Unfortunately, three hundred years later, he lost his life again during a failed heavenly tribulation! This time, he was sent back to where he started, the unwanted son again! Will he repeat his tragic fate this time?

I'm no longer the bullied boy now. Try me if you dare!

(Source: MangaToon)

The Prince Commander of the North wants the daughter of the Shen family as his concubine. In order to give his adoptive mother a better life in her old age, the family's mute servant, Shen Yu, conceals his gender and takes the daughter’s place. But Shen Yu is afraid that once his identity is revealed, he’ll be executed. To his bewilderment and relief, he only attracts the attention of the Prince even more... but is that really a good thing?

(Source: Comikey)

During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers. Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

The Great Emperor Xingxiu in the Immortal World, whose name on the earth was Tang Xiu, died in a disaster. After his death, part of his soul comes back to his body on the earth. To his surprise, ten thousand years in the Immortal World is only equivalent to one year on the earth.

(Source: WebNovel)
A beautiful and successful lady tries to reclaim her life after she gets caught in a twisted game of revenge by a wicked and cruel man.

The journey to the West was a conspiracy of heaven! After Sutra went missing for more than a decade, Heaven sent its army to search, in order not to let the Sutra once again fall into the hands of heaven, the journey to West begin again.

(Source: White Cloud Pavilion)

Note: Includes two extras chapters.

title.romaji: Wo Kao Wudi Beidong Da Chu Cheng Dun Shanghai!
title.native: 我靠无敌被动打出成吨伤害！

description:
In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo was known as a god-level player in the game Tianqi, proficient in all classes. He was just one step away from the very top rank, when he was defeated. But the world gave him a second chance, by transmigrating him into a world that was just like Tianqi's game world. Now with his all-pro god-level game knowledge, he will redeem himself and make up for his past regrets, by doing things his own way.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

In the Republic of China, famous Shanghainese author Xu Youyi has everything anyone could want—until the day an anonymous letter arrives, revealing the truth behind her perfect life. Betrayed by both her best friend and her husband, she meets Yan Wei, the outwardly cold but inwardly warm owner of a photography studio. They click instantly, both independent yet in harmony with one another. Growing closer in the turbulent dangers that surround them, the two different women soothe the scars within each other's heart. Will they be able to save each other?

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue.

title.romaji: Fanpai Shizun De Wo Dai Zhe Tudi Men Tian Xia Wu Di
title.native: 反派师尊的我带着徒弟们天下无敌

description:
Shen Shi was very disappointed when he transmigrated into the book he wrote and didn't even end up as the protagonist. He also didn’t understand why the invincible hero became a girl? Even worse, why did all his apprentices want to become his wife instead! The protagonist asked him, “Master! Would you like to take me right now? Or do I have to kill off the other apprentices first before you'll have me?”

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

The injustices of heaven and earth will be… pah, just because the previous incarnation of Tiandao was a bad guy doesn't mean I have to bear his faults! Even if we are both called Tiandao, we can do things differently. All this terrible fighting and killing! Watch as I re-balance the yin and yang, repair the wheel of reincarnation, and create an ideal world of immortal cultivation… as I take girls into my har… Never mind that, just watch and learn!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Cong Jingshen Bingyuan Zou Chu De Qiangzhe
title.english: The Mighty Warrior From A Mental Hospital
title.native: 从精神病院走出的强者

description:
In a world being invaded by evil creatures, they are no match for the patients at this insane asylum. Even the strongest beasts are stripped of their dignity, reduced to ingredients and pets. Welcome to the Qingshan Asylum, filled with the strongest and most dangerous patients. Lin Fan, considered seriously ill because he claimed to control the system, insisted that he was definitely not insane. He is just a normal person who is trying to cultivate himself by poking the electrical socket, climbing on high-voltage transformers, and standing on the rooftop during a thunderstorm dancing with a metal pole.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

After his death, Jian Chen’s soul was reincarnated into a foreign world. He grew up with swift speed, but at the end, because of overflowing enemies and from being heavily injured, his soul abnormally changed at the border of life and death. From then on, he stepped onto a completely different path of sword cultivation and became the Sword God of the generation.

(Source: Flower Bridge Too)

Having failed in her attempts to become a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer talks about it with other people. Now she just listens to yuri drama podcasts in secret. One day, during a university lecture, she discovers that Yu Chen, a girl from another college, has the same voice as the main character in her favorite sexy yuri podcast…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Let’s take a look at our young hero here, who was born and entered the world of Martial Arts. There’s nothing that he cannot do! Be it music, chess, medicine or even culinary arts. Pretending to be the weakest while he is the strongest. Women from left to right, look at how an orphan rise. An orphan who will solve numerous cases and who will become the master of the city!

After emerging from an accidental journey to the Boss World with a new set of skills, I have been hiding among the other players of Phantom Moon, searching for the secrets concealed within this game. In order to achieve my goals and find my missing brother, I’ll have to bend – and sometimes break – the very rules of this virtual reality in my favor. Guilds? Other Players? Powerful Bosses? All are simply stepping stones on my way to a destiny greater than the game’s mysterious designers could ever have imagined.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wang You: Gua Ji Baiwan Nian, Wo Xinglai Cheng Shen
title.native: 网游：挂机百万年，我醒来成神

description:
When a rift opened to another world, monster rushed through the portal, overwhelming cities as humanity faced apocalyptic ruin! Humanity was forced to take up cultivation, as every nation sought to cultivate powerful heroes to conquer the other-world for fame and fortune! The most powerful warrior of the Dragon Realm, who had slept for a million years, has reawakened with a million years' worth of XP and other resources that had accumulated during his slumber. Now even the most powerful other-world Boss will tremble in fear, and all the Tier 0 heroes from across the world will kneel in respect…

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A new sister work from the same team that authored My wife is from a thousand years ago! If you could go back in time, what would you do?

I would wait for you at the school gate, wait there every day, and relentlessly pursue you until I win you over. What about you?

Hmm... I would wait patiently until I turn twenty-four to meet you again, then proceed step-by-step with dating, marriage, and then I can ask you this question again. I'm proceeding cautiously because I'm afraid the butterfly effect will cause me to lose you."

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

On their wedding day, he was thrown out by his wife and forced to return to his own home, where he was suddenly ambushed by a glamorous woman searching for a kiss. The moment their lips touched, he felt a torrent of energy surge through his body. When he woke up again, his mind was filled with the memories of thousands of strangers...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Da Ai Mozun, Nü Tudi Dou Xiang Sha Wo
title.english: Demon Lord: My Twists with Female Disciples
title.native: 大爱魔尊，女徒弟都想杀我

description:
Bai Feng gets sucked into a romance game, and guess who he becomes? The notorious Dark Overlord, Bai Qingling. In this world, Bai Qingling's the ultimate bad guy: cold, ruthless, obsessed with immortality, and known for dark cultivation and making human puppets. And to top it off, he sees his three female disciples as nothing but pawns. Basically, he's the final boss everyone hates. Now, Bai Feng's gotta use the [Universal Love System] to flip this script and survive. Watch as he turns this nightmare into something else entirely.

(Source: WebComics)

"I think I could fall in love with you."

"You're cute like a little pony."

A love story between the cute but flighty elder girl "Little Fox" and the younger but more mature "Young Pony." See how they flourish both in love and in life!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.english: I Ship My Rival x Me

description:
Wei Yanzi and Gu Yiliang burst onto the acting scene together, igniting a rivalry fueled by their shared debut. But while Gu Yiliang dazzles with his acting prowess and idol-worthy looks, Wei Yanzi finds himself in the shadow with only his striking appearance to boast. Amid the barrage of online hate from Gu Yiliang’s fervent admirers, Wei Yanzi’s patience wears thin.

When Wei Yanzi stumbles upon an online community totally convinced there’s a romantic entanglement between the two actors, he is initially shocked but soon finds solace in their speculation as he immerses himself in their discussions.

Though their relationship is purely professional, Wei Yanzi can’t shake the growing sense that maybe the shippers are onto something. As he spends more time with Gu Yiliang, lines blur, and Wei Yanzi begins to wonder if there might, after all, be truth behind the fan-fueled fantasies!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

Note: Chapter count includes 7 extra chapters.

The innocent starlet Xiao Fengyu got the chance to work with the cold-faced superstar He Yunhan in a variety show as mentor and trainee. It seems like a great chance for Fengyu to get in with the goddess, but how come it feels like she's always running into trouble with her?

Du Ming, young anesthesiologist in a big Chinese hospital, is haunted by the memory of Zhang Qian: a young lady coming from the same school as him , who bewitched him by the sulphurous beauty and the aura of strangeness she emits.
After graduating, Du Ming stayed in touch with Zhang Qian, who writes him. Now a terrible piece of news arises: the young lady is said to have committed suicide.

title.romaji: Wo Kao Jian Lese Shang Wang Zhe
title.english: Junk to King: I Am A Scavenger

description:
You've received a hidden job. Processing… Congratulations, Scavenger! Typhon Ye couldn’t afford to repay the high-interest loans that plagued him after a few failed investments, so his loan shark made him do illegal work for private parties to repay his debts. On one fateful day, Typhon struck down a monster he should never have been able to, and in that instant, experience points surged within him! He’d leveled up from Lv. 0 to Lv. 1! Typhon had triggered his once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to get a job! But the hands of fate had another plan for him, he awakened to a job unheard of in history -Scavenger! A “unique” job that revolves entirely around junk!

(Source: WebComics)

The flawless Prince Nazaire changes schools in hopes of wooing a bride… only to encounter the tyrant Cassius Li! At first, the two cannot stand one another, as they constantly infuriate each other. Yet between ball dances, rescues, and secret rendezvous, Nazaire and Cassius begin seeing each other for who they truly are. But love between a prince and a commoner could never happen, and if Nazaire hopes to ascend the throne, he will have to give up Cassius. Torn between love and duty, can the prince and tyrant reach their happily ever after?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes 1 extra chapter.

The third World War is nearing. Each super power country is going through a communications war to prepare for it, a war to obtain the top profiles' information of enemy countries using the Russian's secret weapon BEAR, China's Hao Long, and the United State's Confidential Assasination Troop, a.k.a. CAT.

title.romaji: Wo Zai Mo Shi Ban Jin Zhuan
title.english: Moving Gold From A Post-Apocalyptic World

description:
Is the road to riches paved with wearing? No, Wang Bin has a better way to get rich, by entering the post-apocalyptic world, collecting gold, going back to his world, and easily becoming a billionaire! That being said, going to the post-apocalyptic world to collect gold is not an easy task, there are countless zombies, aka "wanderers", and the survivors there are more terrifying than the wanderers! In the fight for survival, these survivors are a hundred times more dangerous than wanderers!

(Source: Webnovel)

Qiu Yi is a salaryman in his 20s. After going to the wedding of his highschool crush, he becomes disillusioned as he thinks about the past. However, a sudden shocking event sends him back in time 10 years! ... as a girl named Ye Wen!? Qiu Yi faces another strange twist—his former self still exists!

【Am I still myself? Who exactly am I?】 What kind of sparks might ignite when he, as a girl, meets his male self?

The end of the world is coming, terror covers the whole world, and the earth becomes a hunting ground for zombies and mutants. Zhao Tianlei accidentally obtained a mysterious super system. Although he is not a saint, but seeing the tragic situation in the world and the death of his classmates, how can he stand by and look at how Zhao Tianlei, who has a super upgrade and exchange system, leads humans Fight against corpses, restore human civilization?

The Super Doctor From 2089 Comics Online. A brilliant doctor from 2089 somehow time-travels back to the year 2019, along with all his badassness. Want a healthy body? Go to the Doctor! Want unmatched beauty? Go to the Doctor! Want to survive the ambush by a bunch of mercs? Still, go to the Doctor. This Doctor is capable in every aspect...well, almost every aspect, except when it comes to his romantic encounter with girls.

(Source: MangaToon)

The youngster, Jiang Yinian, became acquaintances with Mu Chen, Lin Dong, and Xiao Yan's descendants on the Spirit Road's Trial, and also stole someone's heart, too. In the process of the trials he realized that he had connections to the Fiend Clan that had been sealed in the Prison Realm, and so, the story begins...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Jinniao Star is under siege. Only those who have a powerful guardian spirit, a "War God", can change their fates and stand against enemies. Rogge is a teen boy; his father had the strongest War God, but betrayed the country, causing Rogge and his mother to be bullied and the loss of their home. To regain the fame and change destiny for his family, this teen boy entered the world's fiercest and scariest place, the Villain Academy, to fight against opponents with powerful War Gods. Can Rogge fight his way out and and become the strongest in this world? What's the truth behind his father's betrayal? Come find out in Final Will.

(Source: MangaToon)

High school student Xiao Xiang An is experiencing life in the big city for the first time while she is staying with her distant relatives. At the behest of her relative's friends, she ends up disguising herself and sneaking into a bar with them where she runs into a handsome and charming employee. The following day she goes back to her regular appearance only to have a very different encounter, meeting a guy who is nothing but rude and hateful!

Saints, the most formidable beings under the heaven. Follow Tie Zhu as he entered one of the elite sects: Heng Yue Sect and work his way toward to become a saint.

(Source: OSTNT)

"Even if this universe is truly nothing more than a brutal, bloody, dark forest, we Cultivators will burn all that we have just to give off a single weak flickering spark in the darkness!"

"No matter how weak each spark is, how short-lived, how small... As long as the sparks flow unabated, then one day one of those sparks will light some tinder, and that tinder shall light some fallen branches, and those branches shall set ablaze each and every last tree of the forest!"

"In the end, even the smallest sparks will eventually set the dark forest ablaze and illuminate the whole world!"

title.english: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality

description: The village boy Han Li was born poor. To subsidize household expenses, he joins the Qixuanmen Sect. Because of his spiritual roots, he was accepted as a disciple by the mysterious Doctor Mo and started to practice "Changchun Gong" arts under his mentorship. Although his qualifications are mediocre, Han Li embarked on the dangerous road of immortal cultivation with his unyielding will and a mysterious vial picked up by accident.

title.romaji: Gao Wujin Hua: Cong Juexing Guaishou Zhi Wang Kaishi
title.english: Martial Evolution: The Beast King Awakens
title.native: 高武进化：从觉醒怪兽之王开始

description:
Heath Yale awakens in a beast-ravaged world where warriors evolve by absorbing monster genes. Though reborn into a weakling's body, he holds the ultimate cheat—limitless monster templates. From cosmic horrors to cinematic legends, Heath unveils powers the world has never seen.

(Source: Webnovel)

Even as acclaimed actress Jing Xiu's wedding was going on, Weibo was flooded with news about the rising star Ji Youyan's death from alcohol poisoning. Then, another piece of news hit the headlines: Jing Xiu's wedding had been called off due to unforeseen circumstances. When Ji Youyan woke up, she found herself transported back in time. Three years ago, to be exact — two years after her breakup with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears she'll never lose Jing Xiu again...

(Source: Bilibili Comics, edited)

Note: Includes one extra chapter.

Framed to death in his previous life, he is reborn to his high school and happens to witness the resuscitation of fairy and the radical change of the world. Being young again, he restarts cultivation. This time, he'll protect his friends and family, he'll leave no regret, and he'll be the eternal king!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Da Zao Le Mori Anquanwu
title.native: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

description:
The world is plunged into an ice age, and 95% of humanity have been wiped out! Despite his kindness, Zhang Yi was betrayed and killed by the very people he helped.

But Zhang Yi is reborn with an awesome power – space manipulation! Given a second chance, he starts hoarding supplies like mad to prepare for the icy apocalypse. This time, he'll be ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to bring vengeance on those who betrayed him in the past life!

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

Bei Ming lost his right arm and leg in a car accident, and ever since people harass him for that. One night he gets attacked by gangsters, but as he's about to die he gets monstrous strength.

(Source: INKR)

Note: Includes two extra chapters.

With a clap of thunder, Feng Yuheng, a god at both Western and traditional Chinese medicine, transmigrates to the time of the Shun Dynasty, into the body of an abused teenaged girl. You wish to kill me? A single stab of my scalpel will paralyze half your body! My pharmacy from the past life is always with me, and fame and fortune rest within the palm of my hand. Even the Emperor wishes to be my acquantance! And you, you roguish prince... are you toying with me?

(Source: Webnovel)

Song Yuan Xun is a homophobe with a cold personality. He matched with Fang Zhao Mu on a dating app, but he absolutely detests him. He discovers that Fang Zhao Mu is more clingy than he thought!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Wo Shi Wu Di Da Tiancai

description:
On the brink of death following a harrowing accident, a college student is granted another chance at life. And this time around, he'll be assisted by the mysterious Prodigy System- an ethereal sentient that awards points and offers abilities that make everything from athletics to exams a breeze.

(Source: Webcomics)

Tang Ming, one of the top cultivators, was defeated by aliens and reborn back into his high school years. He decided to stage a great come back and protect the world. No woman can resist him. The previous life's goddess, talented maiden, sexy teacher, domineering lady and alien princess are all in his harem. No power dares to against him. The thirteen clans, religious groups and secluded mighty cultivators all have to bid him their allegiance. This time, he plays a decisive role in achieveing the properity of cultivation across the world.

(Source: Webnovel)

Born in the ruthless Exile Land where his next meal was never guaranteed, Moon has always aspired to no longer be a worthless human stuck at the edges of society. And while a once in a lifetime opportunity may pay out enough money to let him live his dreams, his road to riches is paved with games of death and survival. Can Moon survive long enough to see better days?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Caifu Ziyou Hou, Tamen Xianshangle Zhongcheng
title.english: Perfect Life System: Double Cash for Her Favor
title.native: 财富自由后，她们献上了忠诚

description:
Miles Shen had it all—good looks, money, the works. Then everything collapsed. His family empire crumbled, he went from trust fund kid to drowning in debt, and his materialistic girlfriend kicked him to the curb without a backward glance. Just when he's hit absolute rock bottom, he gets the "Perfect Life System". The rules? Spend money on any girl who likes him enough (affection level over 60), and he gets double his money back! And just like that, Miles is living a life where normal people go broke from spending, but he just keeps getting richer. He's throwing money around like it's nothing, and somehow his bank account just keeps growing!

(Source: WebComics)

An ordinary girl as she is, she possesses the eyes of death which can make her see the death rate of others. Even if she's troubled, she has no access to death! Hearing her calling, the god of death comes for her. However, it’s useless? What will happen between a girl who desires death and the god of death who cannot kill the girl? What’s the secret of the girl's superpower...

(Source: Webcomics)

Note: 92 mainline chapters + 12 extras chapters, not counting character intro and merchandising announcements.

title.romaji: Wo Ai Shang Le Nü You De Di Di
title.english: Fell in Love with Girlfriend's Brother

description:
To prove whether he was a homosexual, Qiu Zinan decided to dress like a woman and go to a bar. There he “was seduced to the bedroom” by a handsome stranger. Feeling reluctant on the bed, Zinan revealed his true identity, but all they could hear later were the hard breath of one another, and that was how the game began!!

(Source: Webnovel)

When she was young, the vivacious Princess of the Western Kingdom met Latio, a Prince from the Saga Kingdom. As their hearts grew closer, the young king of the Eastern Kingdom, Nia, secretly watched from a distance... Unfortunately, the peace enjoyed between the three kingdoms was not to last, and war was imminent. Childhood friends would eventually be faced with having to choose between their love and their duty. Swords and blood, smoke and tears, loyalty and betrayal all interweave together, forming the song of these young people in the Empire of Theodor.

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes prologue, 2 extra chapters and 11 special episodes.

title.romaji: Liliang Dian Man? Wo Ke Shi Wangling Fashi A!
title.native: 力量点满？我可是亡灵法师啊！

description:
Qiao Yu enters the world of the meta-universe and he is assigned the hidden class of Necromancer. But his intelligence and wisdom stats both start at 0, and he's given a strange and useless talent. In a fit of rage, Qiao Yu decides to put all of his attribute points into strength! Who says a necromancer can’t fight hand-to-hand? Qiao Yu smashes the world-serpent Jörmungandr with one punch, and all the players in the game go crazy. Bro, please stop with the physical combat! You are a necromancer! Please just go summon some undead!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Zai Bu Si Wo Jiu Zhen Wu Di Le

description:
Transmigrating into a world of immortal cultivation, Ye Qing gained the ultimate cheat! He will gain invincibility the moment he dies without suicide! So he tried like crazy to court death!

But then the Empress of Zhou proclaimed, "I met my soul mate in Ye Qing. If he dies, I will die with him!"
An immortal from the heaven realm: "The mortal world is a cruel place, only Master Ye always treated me kindly. I will protect him with my life!"
The common people: No one will be missed in this world, but only Master Ye is irreplaceable. He is a true saint!
Ye Qing: "At this rate I'll become invincible even without dying…"

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

In a world of martial arts, a young boy namned Wu was unable to practice martial arts due to his special body, will he accept his fate and live his life bullied and looked down by others or will he rise and become a master?

(Source: OSTNT)

Shen Sheng was taught to be nice and obedient, he was gentle and tolerant, people called him "Moral Model". One day, he found a secret, and because of the secret, his peaceful life drifted away, he got braver, he released himself from the rules and started to make decisions for himself.

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Note: The chapter count includes 5 special chapters.

A young slacker was insultingly called the 'sleeping god' suddenly unlocked an outlandish martial arts technique by accident. From then on, he became an invincible prodigy who could crush everything in heaven and earth, and pierce the stars with his sword, as all the prodigies tremble at his feet.

(Source: MKZhan, translated)

A world of blood, a world where the strong triumph over the weak, Ye Yun descended to hell to slay hordes of Demons and ascend to Heaven to slay the Gods just to prove his existence as the strongest, a world where a single being can rule over Heaven and Earth.

(Source: Web Comics)

As a rookie game designer, Wang Zixin never imagined that he'd get sent to hell and back by the game's male protagonist. And the only way to escape this death cycle is by crossing into the game and raising Abyss, the game's male protagonist, healthily. Wang Zixin: "Not only do I have to go through this survival game, but I have to raise a child while doing so??? This isn't even humanly possible..."

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Shen Lang transmigrated into another world as a man who married into a wealthy family. However, the clan saw him as a useless wastrel so they kicked him out. Now he's determined to take revenge on them by finding a wife who's prettier, stronger, and have a more powerful title. But he won't be cultivating his own martial arts skills, because there's no way he's any good at it. Instead, he's going to help his wife become the world's strongest fighter, and let her beat up anyone who dares to stand in his way!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Even in his dreams, Li Tianming can’t stop himself from laughing! Why? Because his family pets are all the Primordial Chaos Beasts of myth!
That teeny weeny little chick over there is actually the eternal Infernal Phoenix that eats suns! His black cat is the Genesis Chaos Thunderfiend that refines worlds with its lightning.
The cockroach, well, it’s the Myriad Worlds Deathless Beast that possesses trillions of undying clones…
Followed by his menagerie of pets, Li Tianming begins his ascension to become the number one beastmaster of the ages. He journeys across the many worlds, only one thing remaining constant. No one is ever ready for the likes of his pets! After all, who's ever prepared to fight a chicken and its fellows.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.english: The Magic Chef of Fire and Ice: Season 1

description: Nian Bing is the son of a fire mage and an ice mage. After both of his parents were killed by the Ice Lord, Nian Bing received both of his parents' magic gems. When Nian Bing was trying to escape from the Ice Lord's followers, he managed to cast both fire and ice magic at the same time. An impossible feat for a mage. He fell from the cliff, unconscious, and was saved by an oldman. After he woke up, the oldman gave him a food so delicious he never tasted before. It turned out that the oldman was a genius chef, once called a spirit chef. And he wants Nian Bing to be his disciple no matter what! Is Nian Bing able to seek vengeance while aiming to become the greatest chef?

Xie Cheng, who was born unable to see any color, had been living in a black and white world for many years. Until the day he met Bai Lu, who was being chased, he accidentally discovered that he had brilliant colors. What kind of sparks would be created between two very different people together?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

When a young Ran Tang thwarted a kidnapping attempt on her friend, it left her blind and shunned by her family. A chance encounter brings Zhan Luo into her life and their surprising connections (including being engaged to her horrible sister!) keep pulling them back together. She wants nothing to do with this bad boy and yet the usually cold and standoffish Zhan can’t help but be drawn to her. He’ll basically do anything, yes, ANYTHING, to stay in her life! But how can he get closer to her if he constantly keeps her in the dark?

(Source: Tapas, edited)

Note:
- Includes prologue, Christmas special, and eight epilogue chapters.
- Tapas and INKR have different titles and translations. Tappytoon uses the INKR version.

When Zhang Li left for a trip to the Ebiz ruins, he didn’t expect to bring back company, especially not a man made of stone! Though Li grows fond of the living statue, their time together doesn’t last long, as “Rocky” soon crumbles before Li’s eyes. Wishing for a miracle, Li suddenly finds himself in Ebiz far back in the past and reunites with Rocky. However, his companion is no longer a statue but rather the nation’s king, who doesn’t recognize Li at all and imprisons him! How will Li escape this predicament and get his beloved back?

(Source: Tappytoon)

Over the years, countless powerful cultivators have come and gone. But the world never realized that behind every powerful cultivator, there seemed to be a mysterious... Dark Crow. After the Dark Crow guided a legion of young cultivators to the peak of cultivation and established their own sects, he chose to leave the world behind.

Thousands of years have passed since his departure, and the once mighty sects have become weak and in danger of failing. Finally the Dark Crow returned in the form of a young man, here to fulfill his promise to defend the sects.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Who is he? Why is he called the Boss? Maybe he’s the fearless ruler of the world. Or maybe the worst enemy of humanity, who tears worlds down. After Su Sin was reborn, he lost all his skills and abilities from former life in a knights’ world. However, a newly implanted System can help him restore them. “My name is Su Sin where Sin means Promise keeper”.

Note: Includes one extra chapter.

In the aftermath of a car accident, Yang Ning has inexplicably gotten a set of abilities. He seems to have entered a game-like system. In the real world, there are attributes and tasks, warehouses and shops, and the ability to identify and view information on antiques. He used this ability to get into the antiques market and gain dominance in it.

What else will he do? Oh, pretty girl, come and buy my wares! I promise i won't cheat you! Maybe? Shut up, system! Don't you dare cheat me too!

title.romaji: Bei Kun Bai Wan Nian: Dizi Bianbu Zhu Tian Wan Jie
title.english: Trapped for Millions of Years: My Disciples Are All Over the Universe
title.native: 被困百万年：弟子遍布诸天万界

description:
Lu Chen, an immortal young man, was trapped in the Land of Desolation for over ten million years. After thousands of centuries of meticulous planning, he finally managed to escape... only to find a world vastly different from the one he remembered. The Old Continent had broken into countless pieces, the North and South Poles had been reversed, and the nine suns in the sky had been reduced to a single one; the oceans had sunk dozens of meters deep, huge and powerful prehistoric beasts had all but disappeared, and humans, who millions of years ago were only a small nation of tribesmen, had by now conquered the surface of the Earth. And that's not all: the mangy dog he had picked up by chance is now the leader of a sect, the little girl he had adopted out of kindness has become a fairy of a heavenly realm, and his disciple, whom he had been forced to take in, has become the Celestial Emperor.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Bu Dang Tiangou Hou, Wo Cheng Le Yiwan Shen Hao
title.english: From Simp to Billionaire: The Rise of a Divine Tycoon
title.native: 不当舔狗后，我成了亿万神豪

description:
Lin Xinben was just your ordinary simp. After getting dumped, he received the Shenhao System, which gave him billions to spend right away! But the painful part is that he must spend that money on girls! Oh well, in order to put the money use, Lin Xin will embark on a strange journey of revenge, by becoming a godly playboy!

(Source: Tencent Comics, translated)

title.english: My Disciples Are All Hot Badasses

description:
When he woke from his slumber, the Night King found himself resurrected! It has been 300 years, his disciples that he trained through efforts have now attained immortality and grown up, each beautiful and elegant! “300 years… 300 years! It is my turn to tease…No, guide you all!”

(Source: Webnovel)

A young and broke man, Yang Jinghua, finds himself 10 years younger after waking up from a traffic accident. Just as he is dreaming about it being a rebirth after death and that he will soon reach the peak of his life, a handsome white-haired man who calls himself the “Spirit Cleanser” appears in front of him. After this man tells Yang Jinghua “You are already dead”, he proposes a weird offer: “Boy, do you want to make a pact with me?” Gradually, a deep relationship is developed between these two men and they support each other on their journey.

(Source: Webnovel)

The school’s famous troublemaker—— Gu Ze! Originally only on 30-day class duty, student union vice president Ye Ruchuan ‘changed it a little’, making it 300 days... Two people fighting a battle of wits for whether to be on class duty or not! As the shocked bad guys go their separate ways, Gu Ze and Ye Ruchuan gradually start to get to know each other in the middle of a hateful godlike manipulation, and slowly cultivate an understanding of each other..... delinquent vs. vice president! The daily life of a 17-year-old trying his best to skip class duty!

title.romaji: Wo Shi Yishijie Zui Qiang Lingzhu

description:
To become the ultimate game character, you must meet three conditions: gain access to the game's "Lord System" control panel, take over the body of a noble family's illegitimate son, and make sure nobody else knows they're in a game. Well, Richard Orlando fulfills them all! Now he must build an army and fight through goblins, gnolls, trolls, and more to discover new lands, all while keeping the Lord System a secret. But with that trump card on his side, it'll only be a matter of time before he conquers all and becomes the ultimate Lord of the new realm!

(Source: Tappytoon)
You're flexing in front of me? Watch me humiliate you! Women? I have nine of them! I am matchless! Yeah, that's how arrogant I am!

title.romaji: You Xun Ran Shi Youxi Fei Zenmeban
title.native: 幼驯染是游戏废怎么办

description: The daily lives of a gamer and her girlfriend.

Shen Fan is determined to understand the inner world of the one she has secretly admired for three years. Her desperation draws her like a moth to a flame, even as she knows that her love may kill her. And what does the latter think? "This girl is very interesting, I suppose I could play with her a little."

In the year 2666 of the Earth Era, the world is overrun by monsters, laying waste to human homes. Amid the chaos, a meek warrior with unbreakable spirits and unwavering resolve embarks on a quest to rewrite his destiny and ascend to the rank of the most revered warrior of his time.

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Kaiju Zhen Jing Nüdi Laopo, Wo Wu Di Le
title.english: I Am Invincible: Start From Awing My Empress Wife
title.native: 开局震惊女帝老婆，我无敌了

description:
When Ning Tian opens his eyes in the Celestial World, he’s stunned to find himself in the Queen’s private bedchamber! Once dismissed as a useless good-for-nothing, he’s now set to marry the peerless Queen Luo Wuqing tonight! Just as everyone’s jaws hit the floor, a mysterious system appears and tells him, “Shock others to earn rewards!” From astonishing the Queen to shaking the entire world, Ning Tian begins an unstoppable rise that will leave everyone trembling!

(Source: WebComics)

title.english: Supreme Ocular Master: The Peerless Heiress
title.native: 至尊瞳术师：绝世大小姐

description:
Luo Qingtong, a young lady from the 24th century who ranked first among those with superpowers, miraculously transmigrated into a different world. There, she begins her journey of vengeance as the crippled, oldest daughter of a duke from the lower kingdoms, where villains line up to get face-slapped and scumbags and manipulative bitches wait to get tortured!

An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth. She'll exterminate anyone who offends her! All is going well... but then she accidentally gets involved with a man of peerless beauty, whom she attempts to flirt with whenever she's unable to win against him in a fight. From there on, it becomes a story about their romantic pursuits..."

(Source: WeComics)

A world where humans, beasts, demons, gods, dragons and pixies fight for supremacy; A war where great beast warriors of the Baemon troop, the dragon knights that soar in the sky, and the demon race that befell into the angel troops battle. A mixed blood child, who bears the blood of a human, demon and beast, went through hardships that no other people had, and has unmatched wild war potential. He is destined to restructure the chess pieces of this world, and also fated to have an exceptional heart-wrenching love life.

The cultivation prodigy Zhu Minglang expended all his power to save his companion dragon. Now just a poor, powerless boy, he somehow managed to have a one-night stand with the lady general Li Yunzi. Then his enemies came flying in on fire-breathing dragons, willing to burn down the entire city just to hunt him down while he was weak. Zhu Minglang managed to escape death and became a dragon tamer, looking to start a new legendary journey.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

In the Year 2056, a teenager clad in a tactical vest, combat pants, and alloyed combat boots sat atop a ruined and shattered six story apartment building. The building lies in a Prefecture-level city in the Original Jiangsu area. With a Hexagonal Shield and a Bloodshadow Combat Sword on his back, the young man sat silently on the edge of the roof. Under the brilliant hue from a starry night, it brought forth a breath of fresh air as the night breeze caressed his body. However, within this now ruined city, all was silent... all except for the occasional chill-inducing howls...

(Source: Webnovel)

When the classroom rosters were announced, the school's two most notorious boys Xie Yu and He Chao were not just placed in the same class, but became desk-mates as well. Even though they're obviously smart, they pretend to be delinquents, always acting out, fighting to be last in class rank. They may look like they're playing games and slacking off every day, but they actually study hard in private. So what's the deal with these two guys who are always at the bottom of the class on every test?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

I actually reincarnated into a different world and became the Demon King Overlord?! And my task is to destroy humanity! Wait, that ain't right. I'm a pacifist you know? I'm not like this at all? What? I killed a thousand human army with my energy blast?! That was an accident! It was the relic's fault! It's all a misunderstanding! Hahaha! Why can't we get along nicely? Huh? So what if I'm the devil? Doesn't mean I like doing bad things! Stop annoying me or I will blast you to kingdom come! Wait! Argh! Come on! I'm not that evil! I'm not the Overlord!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Wo Xiu Di Keneng Shi Jiaxian
