Xin Yun is a loser in all the lives he was reborn into, always carefree instead of working hard.

Recently reborn, he finds himself in the past and with the chance to change the course of the future.

Follow Xin Yun's epic journey of self-cultivation to become the true hero of his story.

(Source: INKR)

title.romaji: Dang E Yi Yu Dao Bing Jiao

description:
A yuri story about a yandere commoner × villainess lady. When the arrogant noblewoman He Sha tried to bully the commoner girl Qiao Lin out of jealousy, the yandere Qiao Lin turned the tables and took her first kiss instead. At first, He Sha just wanted to get back at Qiao Lin by playing pranks on her, but eventually it became an excuse to try to attract Qiao Lin's attention… The more the villainess tries to mess with the yandere, the more the yandere returns the favor, which only makes the villainess more tsundere.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Zhanhao is a dedicated cultivator who wishes to reach the top spiritual level before he turns 18. But all cultivators know that the road to leveling up is filled with ups and downs. Zhanhao's challenge comes one day when his father goes missing and he finds himself in "Mystery Land", where he can complete missions to gain special power to break through, but if he fails a mission, the punishment is death.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: He Jingling Gongzhu Qian Dinghunyue Le Wo Gai Zenmeban
title.english: What Should I Do If I've Signed a Marriage Contract with the Elven Princess
title.native: 和精灵公主签订婚约了我该怎么办

description:
Nan Yue was only in transit in the Kingdom of Elven. But she found that she signed a marriage contract with Ah Sha, the elven princess. Wait, I am a girl! How could I marry the princess? Wait, why am I wanted by the world after I sign the marriage contract?? To survive, I have to take the princess for a leap of faith:

"As expected of an uptown girl, you are pretty hot!
"Get lost, you perv!"!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes 20 bonus chapters

title.romaji: Wo, Chuang Zao Le Dushi Chuanshuo!

description:
When Cedric Reid finds himself in a parallel universe full of malevolent beings and comes into possession of a mystical notebook that has the power to turn whatever is written in it into reality, he decides to use it to punish the bad and absorb the powers of other supernatural entities. He later joins an elite group of special agents on a continuing mission to rid the world of evil.

(Source: WebComics)

One is the immortal of heaven, while the other is a good-for-nothing cultivator rookie. When playing an online game encounters cultivation, everything is possible. How could a little rookie climb to the peak of the cultivation world one step at a time? Cute beast or beautiful man? Celestial or divine abilities? Pills or magic treasures? Even if the Great Way was ruthless and filled with dangers, the cute rookie will still break through the heavens!

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Nü Juren Ye Yao Tan Lian'ai

description:
As a lovely girl that is 1.8-meter-tall, Gao Ran falls for the icy president Zhang Yang whose height is 1.69 meters. Owing to self-abasement, however, she comes to grief time and time again. By chance, she is chosen by Zhang Yang as the candidate for the super model, and hence starts her career in the fashion world. Will her journey be smooth and plain?

(Source: Webcomics)

Note: Includes 10 extra chapters.

Su Yuan, a poor student, is accidentally admitted to Ogus Academy in order to release burden for the family. However, it is found that the college is set up to protect half-demons. The weak human begins must team with a half-demon pal (partner) for saving their lives. Su Yuan attracts many pal seekers due to his special smell and suffers various attacks at the same time. Until the day he saved a bloody fox, he found out...

(Source: Pocket Comics)

He is the devil himself in the eyes of villagers, the filial son in the eyes of his godparents, the best puppet craftman in the eyes of his followers, and the weirdo in the eyes of his peers——he is lu xiaoyi, the divine-punished one! "the body of divine punishment...This child is so outstanding, that even the gods are jealous of him." the blind saint said so, "...take his pants off and there is a birthmark like a black bead in his butt cheek..." He is lu xiaoyi, the most special one among ten billions of people..."but everyone has seen my butt now!" he cried...

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Dian Bo Ke Ji De Di Fang

description: Electromagnetic waves craft an illusionary world. Electromagnetic wave user Wei Xiaoran slips in and out of this world— saving others, as well as herself!

Jiang Chen transmigrates into a world of immortal cultivation, but it turns out he has no talent for cultivation at all, so he is destined to remain a mere mortal. What's that at the door? Oh, it's just the golden-winged roc that Jiang Chen happened to catch…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.english: Fall in the Night with You

description:
The sudden appearance of the amnesiac witch, Nyx, has brought a lot of changes to Ren Xi's life. They look out for each other and help each other grow. The spark of chemistry between them has quietly initiated. What Ren Xi wants is to help Nyx retrieve her lost memories. In the process, they discover an astonishing secret...

(Source: WebComics)

Li Qing, a small maintenance worker, was trying to live a honest life and doing a honest job. but he was inexplicably involved in a big family’s struggle. Whatsmore he had a terrifying secret of his own…
